patterns: How can I get New User-id and password
How can I get New login credentials
how to created account
responses: Please click on Sign Up link on AICTE Web-portal

patterns: I have forgotten password for logging in AICTE Web Portal
forgotten password
lost my password
don't remember my password
lost my user_credentials
lost my login id password
i have forget password
forget password
responses: Please refer User Manual for Forgotten Password available @ https://aicteindia.org/bureaus/approval/ap_2020-21

patterns: Is User Id field mandatory for 'Forgot Password' form
Don't have the user-id in forget password
responses: User Id is NOT mandatory. Only Permanent Institute Id is required for existing institute.
Only Permanent Institute Id is required for existing institute

patterns: When I try to login with Institute's Credentials, error message 'Invalid Username and Password' is displayed.
shows invalid institued credentials
can not log in through instituted credentials
responses: Recheck the login credentials. Confirm whether someone else has logged in with the same credentials (Please note that per institute only ONE session is allowed. Hence, if someone tries for 2nd session then again invalid user name and password message will popup).If no session is live and still getting an invalid username and password message, then the password might be incorrect. In such cases, you can Request for forgot password

patterns: How can I apply for Approval Process
How can I apply for Approval Process for our institute.
how to register for apply process
responses: Please login to AICTE Webportal using your institute login credentials then click on Approval Process icon. Follow the instructions given in User Manuals/Videos and apply accordingly. For more information, please go through Approval Process Handbook 2020-21.

patterns: I am not able to generate report?
how to generate report
how i created generate report
help to created generate
responses: Please refer User Manual for Report Generation to generate Reports.
go through User Manual for Report Generation

patterns: How to delete old faculty details?
remove faculty details
responses: Faculty record cannot be deleted. Faculty can be marked as Duplicate or Left the Institute under HOI & Faculty Details tab.

patterns: Is Aadhaar/PAN details mandatory to update faculty details in AICTE Web Portal?
Is Aadhaar/PAN details required to update faculty details in AICTE Web Portal?
Is Aadhaar details required to update faculty details in AICTE Web Portal?
Is PAN details required to update faculty details in AICTE Web Portal?
responses: Yes.

patterns: How to transfer faculty record(individual) from one institute to another institute?
How to transfer faculty record to another institute?
responses: This facility is available under HOI & Faculty tab. Before transferring any individual faculty record from one institute to other institute, the faculty should be compulsorily marked as left the institute in the previous institute.

patterns: How to update/add the faculty details by import method?
Import method
add facility by import method
update details by import method
responses: Please follow the User Manual available https://aicte-india.org/bureaus/approval/ap_2020-21 for uploading faculty details by import method.

patterns: I have made Online Payment but amount is not updated in portal
online payment stuck
online payment not done,but not showing in protal
online payemt not showing in portal
responses: Generally, payment receipt gets updated immediately. In case, your payment receipt is not updated then click on View Transaction Button under Payment tab. Otherwise, it will get updated in 48 to 72 working hours (2 to 3 working days). In case it is not updated even after that, please raise grievance with transaction details (Transaction Id generated while making the payment) through Online Grievance Redressal form. Link is available on Approval Process 2020-21 page.

patterns: I am not able to make payment because AICTE Website is not directing to Payment Gateway.
not open payment gateway
error into the payment gateway
payment gateway vot open
responses: Please check whether your application has been submitted successfully or not. If submitted, then allow Popups for AICTE Website through Web browser URL.

patterns: Where to send the queries related to portal, payment and approval related issues for the
payemt related issue
approval related issue
query related to portal, pyament and approval
responses: Raise a Grievance via grievance form available at https://www.facilities.aicteindia.org/ApprovalProcess/apformEmail.php.

patterns: Our Institution was allotted a User ID last year as a new Institution. Some information was uploaded but the application could not be submitted at that time. Now I want to know that the same User ID can be used for approval process 2020-21.
user id gets but appication not submit
application could not be submitted last year but get user Id
responses: No, Institute need to apply afresh for getting login credentials.

patterns: We want to change details which are non-editable / read-only?
how to changes non-editable details
can i cnages non-editable details
ways to changes read-only datails
responses: You may contact the Approval Bureau or Regional Office.
Contact the Approval Bureau or regional office

patterns: By mistake, I have submitted my application. Is it possible to reopen the application once again to update the few details?
update details after submit
how to update deatail after submit the appication
fill wrong deatils there is way to changes it.
responses: If you have not created any payment record under Payment tab then you can re-open the submitted application only once by clicking on re-open application button available under Attachments and Submit tab.                             Note: After re-open, the application should be resubmitted. Otherwise application will be treated as 'Application Not Submitted'.

patterns: forgotten password email not recive
I have applied for forgot password but still I did not receive password on my registered email?
why forget password email not recice
error in forget password email not reviced
I cant receive any email of forgetting password
responses: Institute need to submit the Affidavit-1 in the respective Regional Office. Regional Officer will flag the Affidavit Received against your request on web portal. Then password will be sent to the instituteâ€™s registered email id. Please check the Spam Folder also in your mailbox for forgot password email. In case of any issue, you may raise your grievance online by Grievance link available https://aicte-india.org/bureaus/approval/ap_2020-21
